io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay

Interface Tile

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlainTile, VisualTile

    public interface Tile
    An interface which all tiles will implement. Contains common tile functions which tiles of any kind must implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean deepEquals(java.lang.Object other)
      Check if a Tile has the same data as another tile, that is, if it has the same owner, terrain, and mule installed.
      MuleType getMule() 
      Player getOwner()
      Returns this tile's owner
      TerrainType getTerrain() 
      default boolean hasOwner()
      Returns if this tile has been claimed by a player yet.
      void setMule(MuleType mule) 
      void setMuleDraw(MuleType mule) 
      void setOwner(Player owner)
      Sets this tile's owner.
      void setTerrain(TerrainType terrain) 

    • Method Detail

      • hasOwner

        default boolean hasOwner()
        Returns if this tile has been claimed by a player yet.
        Returns:
        true if this tile has an owner, false otherwise

      • getOwner

        Player getOwner()
        Returns this tile's owner
        Returns:
        the tile's owner, or null if no owner.

      • setOwner

        void setOwner(Player owner)
        Sets this tile's owner. This will overwrite any existing owner of this tile
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner to set to

      • setMuleDraw

        void setMuleDraw(MuleType mule)

      • getTerrain

        TerrainType getTerrain()

      • setTerrain

        void setTerrain(TerrainType terrain)

      • getMule

        MuleType getMule()

      • setMule

        void setMule(MuleType mule)

      • deepEquals

        default boolean deepEquals(java.lang.Object other)
        Check if a Tile has the same data as another tile, that is, if it has the same owner, terrain, and mule installed.
        Parameters:
        other - tile to compare to
        Returns:
        whether other is equal to this tile
